name: Quiz Quest: Intro Math Edition
description:
Join in on the epic adventure to save Bander Walls from the evil clutches of Mercepus! Battle over through enemies on your way to complete your quest. But you must be mighty with math to make through the journey.

Features
Story Mode
- Includes 5 levels as you battle to defeat Mercepus
- 5 Playable Characters to choose from
- Over 40 enemies to battle
- 6 Difficulty Levels to Master
- Addition
- Subtraction
- Addition & Subtraction
- Multiplication
- Division
- Multiplication and Division

Practice Mode
- Practice each number and difficulty as needed
- Includes stats for the session
- Percentage, Correct Answers, Missed Questions

Local Leaderboard for each Difficulty Level
